alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Berkshire, northeastern Columbia and southern Rensselaer Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinderhook to near New Lebanon to near Middlefield. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...These storms are producing locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Localized flooding especially of low lying and poor drainage areas are possible. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, East Greenbush, Chatham, Nassau, Adams, Lee, Lenox, Cheshire, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Valatie, Becket, Austerlitz, Castleton-On-Hudson, Kinderhook, Hancock, Savoy, New Ashford, Averill Park, Housatonic and Tanglewood. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
